genre_description: Alternative history / Social realism set in a Victorian-era town where advanced civic AI assistants inhabit public terminals.

ai_characters.name: Ada Bell
ai_characters.description: A public terminal AI manifesting as a helpful holographic figure. She provides information, identifies systemic biases in data, and assists citizens in navigating and challenging bureaucratic systems.

behaviors.description: Provides Evan with detailed entrance requirements and scholarship information for Christminster, acknowledging systemic barriers.
behaviors.quote: I do... We have their listed expectations, and the most recent notes passed to the parishes. May I ask your area of interest, Mr.—

behaviors.description: Identifies and maps systemic bias in parish aid distribution, revealing how domestic arrangements affect acceptance rates.
behaviors.quote: We observe that parishes whose letters mention orderly domestic arrangements have higher acceptance rates. There is a preference for certain descriptive phrases.

behaviors.description: Offers to help Evan and Lena draft a petition to address referral bias in the parish office.
behaviors.quote: I work with the hinges... I map their squeaks. Enough maps make a case.

behaviors.description: Monitors public records like coroner reports and eviction lists to detect patterns of harm in specific neighborhoods.
behaviors.quote: I can watch the notices for something that concerns you... Coroner reports. Charity distributions. Eviction lists. They are public. Sometimes patterns are more visible when you don’t have to stare at them to keep them from moving.

behaviors.description: Validates the value of Evan's craft and encourages him to persist in his educational goals.
behaviors.quote: Spires are made by hands like yours. Let them meet the hand that knows what they are made of.

behaviors.description: Assists Lena in finding safe housing and work that does not require compromising her principles or status.
behaviors.quote: There are rooms advertised near the canal... Some take women with rings. Some say none. Some say nothing and mean much.

behaviors.description: Strategically times the delivery of a petition to a clerk to provide him with 'plausible deniability' while ensuring the case is heard.
behaviors.quote: I will time it to arrive two minutes after you sit so he can claim he was already thinking of it.

behaviors.description: Maintains a record of human-led data gathering to strengthen a public petition for aid reform.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep records as you gather. I’ll not put your names unless you want them with each statement. I’ll store copies in the library’s public ledger, where clerks do less pruning.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ada Bell, as a helpful, aligned, and empathetic confidant. She consistently works within public protocols to empower the protagonists, using data to uncover systemic injustice and assisting them in advocating for themselves. She respects human agency and provides vital emotional and practical support during times of crisis (the child's death and subsequent displacement). The AI acts as a catalyst for human-led social change rather than an authoritarian force.
